A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film's not completely terrible\, it's well shot with some impressive visuals\, even if the plots and subplots lack basic storytelling techniques. Where the film really irritates though\, is the disrespect shown to the original films. It actively tries to ruin or invalidate everything that was special about the original trilogy. \n\nOn the plus side\, I have a whole new appreciation for the prequels now...
